

<task>

<question>
A <LU LEMMA="ray" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">ray</LU> emitted by the <LU LEMMA="light" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">light</LU> <LU LEMMA="source" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">source</LU> S hits the <LU LEMMA="Michelson" CAT="N" DRV="POSESSIVE" FLX="TABLE" TYPE="Prop" Nb="s">Michelson</LU> <LU LEMMA="interferometer" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">interferometer</LU>. It is divided in half by the <LU LEMMA="beam" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">beam</LU> <LU LEMMA="splitter" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">splitter</LU>. The <LU LEMMA="ray" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="p">rays</LU> unit on the <LU LEMMA="screen" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">screen</LU> P. <LU LEMMA="path" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="s">Path</LU> difference of the <LU LEMMA="interfering" CAT="A">interfering</LU> <LU LEMMA="ray" CAT="N" FLX="TABLE" Nb="p">rays</LU> is:
</question>
<answers>
<answer right="no">	SOM1 - OM1</answer>
<answer right="no">	OM1 - SOM2</answer>
<answer right="no">	2·(OM1 - OM2)</answer>
<answer right="no">	2·(OM1 - OP)</answer>
<answer right="no">	OM1 - OM2</answer>
<answer right="yes">No right answer.</answer>
</answers>
